mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users_basic_info (uid, nickname, create_at) VALUES (#{uid}, #{nickname}, #{create_at})
INSERT INTO users_core_info (uid, account, password, email, last_login_at) VALUES (#{uid}, #{account}, #{password}, #{email}, #{last_login_at})
INSERT INTO users_history_pointer (uid, newest, oldest) VALUES (#{uid}, #{newest}, #{oldest})
INSERT INTO users_history_info_shard_${shardIndex} (id, uid, time, question, sequence_num) VALUES (#{id}, #{uid}, #{time}, #{question}, #{sequence_num})
